content:
Hello, I am a new contributor, and my PR (https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/20936) is showing an issue where it checks for unused imports. However, this import is necessary when running locally
././././Mathlib/RingTheory/FilteredAlgebra/InduceMaps.lean:
remove #[Mathlib.GroupTheory.GroupAction.SubMulAction]
Error: The process '/usr/bin/env' failed with exit code 1
See the instruction: use lake exe shake --fix to fix this, or lake exe shake --update to ignore

Since this came up recently:

  • fix means automatically change the imports of your files;
  • update means automatically modify noshake, in case the imports are really needed and shake is not detecting a dependency.
Thank you for your assistance. I have successfully resolved this issue.
Yi.Yuan has marked this topic as resolved.
